# Wallet operations

Wallet operations are accessible under the wallet sub-client which is accessible via the `wallet()` method on the client.
`WalletClient` documentation can be found [here](https://web3.docs.massa.net/classes/WalletClient.html).

Here is the list of available operations:

### Create account

Static method to generate a new account.

<WalletGenerateNewAccountBlock />

Defined in [src/web3/WalletClient.ts:314](https://github.com/massalabs/massa-web3/blob/41f5634/src/web3/WalletClient.ts#L314)

### Get account

Static method to get an account from a given private key.

<GetAccountFromSecretKeyBlock />

Defined in [src/web3/WalletClient.ts:345](https://github.com/massalabs/massa-web3/blob/41f5634/src/web3/WalletClient.ts#L345)

### Add accounts to wallet

After creating accounts or getting it from private keys, you can add them to a wallet.

<AddAccountsToWalletBlock />

Defined in [src/web3/WalletClient.ts:213](https://github.com/massalabs/massa-web3/blob/41f5634/src/web3/WalletClient.ts#L213)

### Add secret keys to wallet

You can directly add an account to the wallet by providing its secret key.
Returns the list of accounts that were added to the wallet.

<AddSecretKeysToWalletBlock />

Defined in [src/web3/WalletClient.ts:164](https://github.com/massalabs/massa-web3/blob/41f5634/src/web3/WalletClient.ts#L164)

### Set base account

Set the base account that will be used as the default account for the wallet.

<SetBaseAccountBlock />

Defined in [src/web3/WalletClient.ts:100](https://github.com/massalabs/massa-web3/blob/41f5634/src/web3/WalletClient.ts#L100)

### Get base account

Retrieves the default (base) account of the wallet.

<GetBaseAccountBlock />

Defined in [src/web3/WalletClient.ts:120](https://github.com/massalabs/massa-web3/blob/41f5634/src/web3/WalletClient.ts#L120)

### Get wallet account by address

Retrieves a wallet account based on its address.

<GetWalletAccountsByAddress />

Defined in [src/web3/WalletClient.ts:140](https://github.com/massalabs/massa-web3/blob/41f5634/src/web3/WalletClient.ts#L140)

### Get wallet accounts

Retrieves all accounts stored in the wallet.

<GetWalletAccountsBlock />

Defined in [src/web3/WalletClient.ts:129](https://github.com/massalabs/massa-web3/blob/41f5634/src/web3/WalletClient.ts#L129)

### Remove addresses from wallet

Remove a list of addresses from the wallet.

<RemoveAddressesFromWalletBlock />

Defined in [src/web3/WalletClient.ts:267](https://github.com/massalabs/massa-web3/blob/41f5634/src/web3/WalletClient.ts#L267)

### Clean wallet

Removes all accounts from the wallet, even the base account.

<CleanWalletBlock />

Defined in [src/web3/WalletClient.ts:136](https://github.com/massalabs/massa-web3/blob/41f5634/src/web3/WalletClient.ts#L136)

### Get account balance

Retrieves the balance of an account, or null if the account is not found.

<GetAccountBalanceBlock />

Defined in [src/web3/WalletClient.ts:547](https://github.com/massalabs/massa-web3/blob/41f5634/src/web3/WalletClient.ts#L547)

### Get wallet info

Get {secretKey, publicKey} for all accounts in the wallet.

<WalletInfoBlock/>

Defined in [src/web3/WalletClient.ts:283](https://github.com/massalabs/massa-web3/blob/41f5634/src/web3/WalletClient.ts#L283)

### Send MAS

Sends native MAS from a wallet address to another. If no executor is specified, the base account will be used.
`ITransactionData` is passed as a parameter to the method.

<SendTransactionBlock />

Defined in [src/web3/WalletClient.ts:574](https://github.com/massalabs/massa-web3/blob/41f5634/src/web3/WalletClient.ts#L574)

### Wallet sign message

Static method to sign the provided data with the given address present in the wallet. Signer account has to be specified explicitly.

<WalletSignMessageBlock />

Defined in [src/web3/WalletClient.ts:429](https://github.com/massalabs/massa-web3/blob/41f5634/src/web3/WalletClient.ts#L429)

### Sign message

Signs the provided data with the given address present in the wallet. Signer account has to be specified explicitly.

<SignMessageBlock />

Defined in [src/web3/WalletClient.ts:374](https://github.com/massalabs/massa-web3/blob/41f5634/src/web3/WalletClient.ts#L374)

### Verify signature

Verify a signature, returns true if the signature is valid, false otherwise.

<VerifySignatureBlock />
